Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

Just wondering if anyone can hook me up with a link to download the SDK for Windows, the one in the wiki has expired and I can\'t seem to find one on the forums.

It should be on the download page where the Demo can be found.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Yep, didn\'t think to look there, not sure why.

Thank You
